title: Burpees
steps: Start standing, then drop into a squat with hands on the ground.
Kick your feet back into a push-up position.
Return to squat and jump up with arms raised.

title: High Knees
steps: Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible.
Pump your arms to increase intensity.
Maintain pace for a set duration.

title: Jumping Jacks
steps: Start with your feet together and hands at your sides.
Jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms.
Return to the starting position and repeat.

title: Squat
steps: Lower your hips back and down like you're sitting.
Keep knees behind toes, chest lifted.
Return to standing position and repeat.
